sentences.en: a young film director who is on the crest of a wave at the moment
sentences.cn: 目前正处于巅峰时期的一位年轻电影导演

sentences.en: Be modest when you are on the crest of the wave.
sentences.cn: 在最得意的时候要谦虚.

sentences.en: Both birds had a dark blue crest.
sentences.cn: 两种鸟都长着深蓝色的羽冠。

sentences.en: But at the crest he saw a shallow valley, empty of life.
sentences.cn: 可是到了山头,只看见一片死沉沉的, 寸草不生的浅谷.

sentences.en: Feliks saw the crest on the back of the envelope.
sentences.cn: 费利克斯看了看信封背面的顶饰.

sentences.en: He reached the crest of the hill before dawn.
his career is on the crest of a wave at present.
sentences.cn: 现在他的事业正处于巅峰时期。

sentences.en: Never attempt to overtake on the crest of a hill.
sentences.cn: 在坡顶绝不要企图超车.

sentences.en: On the wall is the family crest.
sentences.cn: 墙上挂着那个家族的饰章。

sentences.en: surfers riding the crest of the wave
sentences.cn: 正在浪峰上冲浪的运动员

sentences.en: The hissing crest of the huge wave bites at your shoulder.
sentences.cn: 发出啸声的巨浪的浪峰劈头盖脑地向你袭来.

sentences.en: The moment Wolf entered his house his crest fell.
sentences.cn: “狼”只要一走进家里,立刻就垂头丧气.

sentences.en: The stone buildings perch on a hill crest.
sentences.cn: 那些石头房子坐落在山顶上.

sentences.en: Their new outpost was on the crest of a hill.
sentences.cn: 他们新的前哨阵地设在一座小山包顶上.

sentences.en: There were patches of old snow under the crest.
sentences.cn: 山顶下星星点点还残存着积雪.

sentences.en: They crested a wooded hill shortly before sunset.
sentences.cn: 太阳就要落山之前，他们登上了一座树木茂盛的小山巅。

sentences.en: Where a trough and crest coincide we get the total amplitude zero.
sentences.cn: 在波峰与波谷重合之处,总振幅实际上为零.

words.tran_cn: 有羽冠的；有顶饰的；有饰章的
在…上加顶饰（crest的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 波峰因素；峰值系数；振幅因数

phrases.phrase: on the crest of a wave
phrases.tran_cn: 处于胜利的时候；得意之时

trans.tran_cn: 山顶，羽毛饰，鸡冠，（动物的）颈脊
trans.tran_en: the top or highest point of something such as a hill or a wave
to reach the top of a hill or mountain

trans.tran_cn: 到达绝顶，形成浪峰，达到顶点
加上顶饰，到达…的顶部，形成冠毛状顶部，到达顶部
